location.mountain: Mt. Diancang (점창산 / 點蒼山) - 18 peaks over 3,500m.
location.environment: High altitude plateaus, eternal spring climate (near Kunming/Chunseong), borderland near Vietnam/Laos/Myanmar.
location.geo_political_status: Located on the periphery (Southern Edge). Often serves as the first line of defense against the 'Southern Barbarians' (Nanman / 남만).

heritage.origin: Resistance fighters of the fallen Dali Kingdom (대리국) & Tianlong Temple (천룡사).
heritage.ideology: Taoist roots mixed with Buddhist influences (from Dali).
heritage.nature: Secular and Practical (Sok-ga) due to distance from Central Plains orthodoxy.

combat_style.signature_tactic: Diancang Dual Swords (점창쌍검 / 點蒼雙劍) - Fighting in pairs to cover blind spots.

characteristics.reputation: Remote and aloof. They focus on training and survival against local threats rather than Murim politics.

signature_ultimate.name: 사일검법 (Shooting Sun Sword Art / 射日劍法)
signature_ultimate.description: The supreme art of Diancang. Legendary technique capable of shooting down the sun (myth of Houyi).
moves: 후예사일 (Houyi Shoots the Sun) - The killing move.

list: 회풍무류검 (Returning Wind Dancing Willow Sword) - Soft/Defensive.
응조칠식경공 (Eagle Claw Seven Style Lightness Art)

narrative_role: The 'Southern Commander' of the Orthodox faction.
Experts in fighting non-Han Chinese martial arts (Southern tribes/Beasts).
Users of 'Combination Attacks' (Twin Swords), challenging individualistic protagonists.
A sect that retains the royal dignity of the fallen Dali Kingdom.
